channel.title: fun on 2nd Grade Magazine
channel.description: Recent content in fun on 2nd Grade Magazine

item.title: Weird Things
item.description: There could be a lot of weird things just lying around your house. Take a closer look at all of them. You can add some weird things to this article when you finish reading it. Weird Thing #1 These are two carrots that grew together. They twisted around each other and grew together at the top. You can take the two twisted parts apart but you can never take it apart into two twisty carrots because, as I already said, they grew together at the top.

item.title: Rescue Riders
item.description: Rescue Riders are a team of two people and five dragons. The people ride on the dragons and rescue people and dragons but mostly people. Here you learn more about them. Versions of Leyla’s Dragon Diary Hedvika’s Dragon Diary: Go to the diary Filip’s Dragon Diary: Watch the video Movies Rescue Riders have two seasons and also the following movie specials: Hunt for the Golden Dragon Trailer: Secrets of the Songwing Trailer: Songs:
